name: The Greatest's GMTK 2022 GameJam Game
description:
GMTK GameJam game with the prompt: Roll of the dice. Action Dice is a Turn based tile game, but you won't know how many actions you get tell it's your turn and the dice roll. Still a bunch of things to be added such as animations (dice rolling animation at each turn would be nice), particle effects, and music. Also should probably rewrite the path planning for enemies and either stop enemies from entering a same spot or figure out how to show multiple at same tile. 

Used this tileset to make the game: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

Used A* for path planning from: https://arongranberg.com/astar/
